page.title: 13CHILDHOOD IN CHELTENHAM
page.content:
{MY BEDROOM}is at the very top of the house. While it was being re-plast- ered I had to sleep in the basement. I have a big wardrobe with lots of skirts,T-shirts, party dresses, jeans and some dresses for playing in the garden. I have a lot of ornaments, my favourite is a china thimble. I have a box of books and a desk. I keep my toys in a cupboard. When I am in my room I sometimes listen to music. I have a tape player, record player and radio all in one.
The BMX bicycle track in our area cost Â£17,000 to build on a former factory site. "BMX-ing" is the favourite form of{recreation }of 5 to 15 year olds. Rowanfield Junior School boasts a champion holding 19 trophies.
